Packages that use CentsMoney
org.middleheaven.quantity.money Extended implementation of the Money pattern. 
 

Uses of CentsMoney in org.middleheaven.quantity.money
 

Methods in org.middleheaven.quantity.money that return CentsMoney
 CentsMoney[] CentsMoney.allocate(java.lang.Integer firstPercentage, java.lang.Integer... percentages)
          Allocate this money amount according to a percentage distribution All money is divided among the installments.
 CentsMoney[] CentsMoney.distribute(int installments)
          Allocate this money amount in n installments.
 CentsMoney[] CentsMoney.distribute(int installments, int incrementedInstallment)
          Allocate this money amount in determinate number of installments.
 CentsMoney CentsMoney.divide(int n)
          Divides the amount equally between n installments So 100 divided by 3 will return 33,33 for a 2 fraction digits currency.
 CentsMoney[] CentsMoney.divideAndRemainder(int n)
          Divides the amount equally between n installments returning the quotient and rest of that division.
